content: @cjgillot we are going to get together with @LÃ©o Lanteri Thauvin to work on some incr comp stuff
I think we can first go over #95092 and then we can discuss with you what else to do
just to be a bit more clear, I guess in the first step you meant to sort by def_path_hash
@cjgillot maybe if you can further expand information here would be great :)

Today, the definitions in those lists are sorted by def_path_hash. I guess this was meant to make metadata independent of the relative order of items. However, this creates a random-looking order. This is still necessary because the order that comes from the visitor is the DefIndex order, which is incompatible avec incr comp. #95004 is supposed to fix that.
In the mean time, you can proceed with steps 2, 3 and 4, leaving the sorting where it is. If there is a modification in the ordering of diagnostics, we will have to revise that position, or advance faster on #95004.
